title: What is the cost and quality difference with normal painting service and service from companies like Asian Paints? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well if you’re looking at using specialised paint products, belonging to a particular brand. Like textures, designs or finishes you can’t expect a normal contractor to deliver the same quality as a trained contractor from the company can give you. For regular paint jobs a normal contractor would suffice, as the company contractors are way more expensive.
